meanings.definition: The cup-shaped socket of the hip joint.
meanings.sent1: The acetabulums in the hip joint help to hold the leg bone in place.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the acetabulums to ensure there was no dislocation.
meanings.sent3: The acetabulums in the hip joint were like little cups cradling the leg bone.
meanings.sent4: Her hip joint felt like a puzzle piece fitting perfectly into the acetabulums.
meanings.sent5: The acetabulums, like tiny bowls, provided stability to the hip joint.
